short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Backup all open tabs to a text file.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tab Backup & Restore is a simple Chrome extension that lets you back up and restore all your open tabs. With a single click, you can download a list of your current tabs as a .txt file and later restore those tabs by uploading the file. It's perfect for saving your browser session or transferring tabs between devices!


Features:
One-click backup of all open tabs to a text file.

Easy restore of tabs from a saved backup file.

Lightweight and user-friendly interface.

Never lose your browsing session again!
